titles.title: As strangers and pilgrims living in this earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As strangers and pilgrims living in this earth
We declare Your promises are true
Knowing You have provided a better things for us
We come boldly for mercy before Your throne of grace
We'll go forth and not turn back

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This world is not my home
I'm looking for a better country
This life is not my own
I'm coming to Your throne
This world is not my home
I'm looking for a better country
This life is not my own
I'm coming home to you
